actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that aviators who meet the qualification standards of the Air Forces Escape and Evasion Society should be granted recognition for meritorious service by the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that aviators who meet the qualification standards of the Air Forces Escape and Evasion Society should be granted recognition for meritorious service by the Department of Defense.
